title: Congratulating the North Syracuse All Star Baseball Team on their 2010 Babe Ruth World Series Championship
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION congratulating the North Syracuse All Star Base-
ball Team on their 2010 Babe Ruth World Series Championship

WHEREAS, Excellence and success in competitive sports  can  be  achieved
only  through  strenuous  practice,  team  play  and team spirit that is
nurtured by dedicated coaching and strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, Athletic competition enhances the moral and physical develop-
ment of the young people of this State, preparing them for the future by
instilling in them the value of  teamwork,  encouraging  a  standard  of
healthy living, imparting a desire for success and developing a sense of
fair play, teamwork, and competition; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize and pay
tribute  to those young people within the State of New York who, achiev-
ing outstanding success  in  athletic  competition,  have  inspired  and
brought pride to their community; and
  WHEREAS,  This  Legislative  Body  is justly proud to congratulate the
North Syracuse All Star Baseball Team on their  13-to  15-year-old  2010
Babe Ruth World Series Championship; and
  WHEREAS,  To  bring  home a World Series Championship, as did the 2010
North Syracuse All Star Baseball Team, is a wonderful  achievement;  the
Team  defeated  Saginaw  Valley,  Michigan,  7-4, to capture their first
World Series Championship after competing  in  three  consecutive  World
Series; and
  WHEREAS,  In addition to the North Syracuse's Team success, 2010 was a
year for individual milestones as well; Bishop Ludden's Ryan O'Kane  was
named  the  tournament's  Most Valuable Player, and Baldwinsville's Gabe
Levanti and Liverpool's Pat Wright were named to the All-Tournament Team
along with O'Kane; and
  WHEREAS, No team, no matter how gifted one or a handful of its members
may be, can succeed without outstanding  talent  throughout  its  entire
roster;  such was the case for the 2010 North Syracuse All Star Baseball
Team whose players included: Tyler Bliss, Joe Bodnar, Dan  Brower,  Alex
Caruso,  Brett Charbonneau, Matt DiPaulo, Eric Hamilton, Brandon Kapcin-
ski, Gabe Levanti, Ryan  O'Kane,  Nick  Pilotti,  Pat  Wright,  and  Dan
Zimmerman; and
  WHEREAS,  The  success of the North Syracuse All Star Baseball Team is
due in great part to the efforts of Manager Dom Caruso and his outstand-
ing Assistant Coaches Tom Medicis and John Levanti; the  Team  was  also
assisted by the never-ending encouragement and support of friends, fami-
ly and the community; and
  WHEREAS,  The  2010 North Syracuse All Star Baseball Team shared note-
worthy attributes off the field as well as in competition;  individually
and  collectively, they constantly exhibited good sportsmanship, thereby
demonstrating to themselves and to others that  they  have  an  enviable
combination  of talent and character which reflects favorably upon their
community; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate  the  2010  North  Syracuse All Star Baseball Team on their
Babe Ruth World Series Championship; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the members of the 2010 North Syracuse All Star Baseball Team
and its Coaches.
